title: Exterior Package
description: Our exterior package includes a full wash and wax of your vehicle. We'll make sure your car is shining like new and looking delicious like this burgermobile!
whatsIncluded: Hand Wash w/ Microfiber Mitt and Snow Foam Soap
Light spray wax for paint protection

title: Interior Package
description: Our interior package includes a full vacuum and shampoo of your vehicle.
whatsIncluded: Dashboard, Console, and Door Panel wipedown

title: Full Detail Package
description: Our full detail package includes both the exterior and interior packages. We'll make sure your car is standing out from the rest of the crowd like a star in the night sky!

title: Ceramic Coating
description: Our ceramic coating includes an exterior wash, clay bar treatment, iron decontamination, and paint correction!

title: Paint Correction
description: Our paint correction includes an exterior wash, clay bar treatment, iron decontamination, polish, compound, and wax!
